alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 7:12PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nuckolls County through 800 PM CDT... At 712 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nelson, or 32 miles northwest of Belleville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nora around 720 PM CDT. Nelson around 730 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
